description: There are many many reasons their Horizon Hybrid Shorts are their #1 selling shorts overall. The Horizons are ultra versatile and take you from dry to wet to dry again all day long. Made of rugged ripstop fabric with features like a rear zip pocket and a drawstring waist cord to keep things on lock down when you take the plunge.
name: Howler Bros Horizon Hybrid Shorts 2.0 - Mens
